actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: A bill to amend section 3 of the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to coordinate and synchronize pesticide data requirements.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to provide that whenever one or more States or Federal agencies request certain data in support of a pesticide registration, they must coordinate and synchronize such requests so as to avoid unnecessary repetition and redundancy. Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to promulgate rules with respect to the development and implementation of such coordination.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3 of the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to coordinate and synchronize pesticide data requirements.
